quote: I see happiness as a by-product. I don't think you can pursue happiness. I think that phrase is one of the very few mistakes the Founding Fathers made.
author: James Hillman

quote: I suffer a lot with mental health and stuff, so I had to find something that was going to make me OK with who I was and also give me some peace and happiness with being alive. So yeah, I've worked hard on myself.
author: Sasha Lane

quote: I don't think that sin and pursuing happiness are not necessarily the same thing.
author: Dan Savage

quote: What Washington desperately needs now are citizen legislators that are dedicated to leading a free people and to maintain our God-given right to the pursuit of life, liberty, and the pursuit of happiness.
author: Ralph Norman

quote: I think there are different kinds of happiness. We know when we're happy a lot of the time, but then there are those moments that have more of an afterglow, when the happiness has more depth.
author: Ariel Gore

quote: I think family, friends and a sense of community give you greater happiness than money. But, of course, one has to have a minimum on which to live. The joy I get from sitting around and having a laugh is immeasurable - much greater than anything that I have ever bought.
author: Sanjeev Bhaskar

quote: Even when they have nothing, the Irish emit a kind of happiness, a joy.
author: Fiona Shaw

quote: From an early period, I had the happiness to rank among the foremost in the American Revolution. In the affection and confidence of the people, I am proud to say, I have a great share.
author: Marquis de Lafayette

quote: People will say candy is recession-proof, and we're definitely seeing nostalgic candies coming about, and people want that sugar rush and that nostalgic happiness, like their childhood times.
author: Dylan Lauren

quote: Marriage and being a mother are absolutely crucial to my happiness and my life.
author: Keeley Hawes

quote: Surveillance cameras might reduce crime - even though the evidence here is mixed - but no studies show that they result in greater happiness of everyone involved.
author: Evgeny Morozov

quote: We all have the same destiny. The difference is opening ourselves up to possibilities to joy, hope, and happiness along the way. Give yourself and others a chance to take advantage of what's out there and available.
author: Diane Ladd

quote: Happiness is obsolete: uneconomic.
author: Theodor W. Adorno

quote: I was the funny one in my group; there was a lot pressure to be responsible for everyone's happiness. I didn't like watching other friends of mine be called the 'pretty one' or the 'smart one.' That had no depth, and it didn't match how I knew them.
author: Lucy Dacus

quote: Happiness is just a positive perception from our brain. Some days, you will be unhappy. Our brain is a tool we use. It's not who we are.
author: James Altucher

quote: The universe is conspiring in every moment to bring me happiness and peace.
author: Marianne Williamson

quote: I'm actually tougher on myself as I get older. It's a vicious cycle. The things that are important in life are the things that you can't buy in life: love, health and happiness. I say that, and I believe that, and I try to live that.
author: Criss Angel

quote: You can run, run, run away from a lot of things in life, but you can't run away from yourself. And the key to happiness is to understand and accept who you are.
author: Dale Archer

quote: Christianity is sustained by the knowledge that the object of man's life on earth is his development as an eternal being. Therefore, none of his expressions of life can be an end in itself, but must serve a higher purpose than the earthly life and happiness of the individual - or even than that of the race.
author: Ellen Key

quote: Might we... be doing something with our brains that cannot be described in computational terms at all? How do our feelings of conscious awareness - of happiness, pain, love, aesthetic sensibility, will, understanding, etc. - fit into such a computational picture?
author: Roger Penrose

quote: As a man, if you're married, your happiness is with her happiness. If she's unhappy, everything's messed up. It's a woman's world for sure.
author: BJ the Chicago Kid

quote: I don't like Paris so much, and it's only eight shows. I mean, don't tell them that, of course. But everyone always thinks they're so important. And I'm sure they are. But to me, my happiness is more important.
author: Gisele Bundchen

quote: To comprehend the Wisdom of this Injunction the better, and explain the Duty before us, it should be considered, that Government is the only Means by which human Happiness can be attained.
author: Charles Inglis

quote: I don't want to put happiness off to the future, because you never know what life will bring.
author: Jennifer Connelly

quote: Within the walls of our own homes, we can and should bear pure testimony of the divinity and reality of the Father and the Son, of the great plan of happiness, and of the Restoration.
author: David A. Bednar

quote: People have to work to maintain happiness. It's easy to be miserable. It's easy to stay miserable. It's easy to live in a place where nothing's working and not being able to work your way out of it. It's much harder to choose happiness, to choose laughter, to choose a positive.
author: Tituss Burgess

quote: The eternal God - the infinite Jehovah - has done all he could do - even to the sacrificing his own Son - to provide a way for man's happiness, and yet they reject him, hate him, and laugh him to scorn!
author: Elijah Parish Lovejoy

quote: The thing that really matters to me is well-being and happiness. Maybe it comes from knowing people who have tortured themselves trying to meet these strangely narrow and rigorous definitions of what our culture thinks is beautiful.
author: Jennifer Connelly

quote: Childhood is Last Chance Gulch for happiness. After that, you know too much.
author: Tom Stoppard

quote: Power, after love, is the first source of happiness.
author: Stendhal

quote: I've been very lucky to have achieved a lot of the things that I dreamt of achieving as a young man. But, at the end of the day - and I truly believe this - it is not about achieving great wealth or success. Because they don't bring happiness, ultimately.
author: Leonardo DiCaprio

quote: The happiness of the creature consists in rejoicing in God, by which also God is magnified and exalted.
author: Jonathan Edwards

quote: Although the skills aren't hard to learn, finding the happiness and finding the satisfaction and finding fulfillment in continuously serving somebody else something good to eat, is what makes a really good restaurant.
author: Mario Batali
